foreignData.name: Maskottchenschau
foreignData.text: Erzeuge einen 2/1 weißen und schwarzen Tintling-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit, einen 3/2 roten und weißen Geist-Kreaturenspielstein und einen 4/4 blauen und roten Elementarwesen-Kreaturenspielstein.

foreignData.name: Exhibición de mascotas
foreignData.text: Crea una ficha de criatura Tintícola blanca y negra 2/1 con la habilidad de volar, una ficha de criatura Espíritu roja y blanca 3/2 y una ficha de criatura Elemental azul y roja 4/4.

foreignData.name: Sortie des mascottes
foreignData.text: Créez un jeton de créature 2/1 blanche et noire Encrelin avec le vol, un jeton de créature 3/2 rouge et blanche Esprit et un jeton de créature 4/4 bleue et rouge Élémental.

foreignData.name: Esibizione delle Mascotte
foreignData.text: Crea una pedina creatura Scarabocchio 2/1 bianca e nera con volare, una pedina creatura Spirito 3/2 rossa e bianca e una pedina creatura Elementale 4/4 blu e rossa.

foreignData.name: マスコット展示会
foreignData.text: 飛行を持ち白黒の２/１の墨獣・クリーチャー・トークン１体と、赤白の３/２のスピリット・クリーチャー・トークン１体と、青赤の４/４のエレメンタル・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。

name: Mascot Exhibition
originalText: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying, a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token, and a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.

rulings.text: Lesson is a spell subtype found on some instant and sorcery cards in the Strixhaven set. The Lesson subtype has no special rules associated with it.
Although you may want to include Lessons in your sideboard if you’re playing with cards that instruct you to learn, Lesson cards can be included in your main deck like other instant or sorcery cards.

text: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying, a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token, and a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
